def min1to9(x,y):
    string = str(x)
    for j in range(y):
        string += str(x)
    return int(string)
t = int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    candles = map(int,raw_input().split())
    y = min(candles)    
    x = candles.index(y)
    try:
        z = candles[1:].index(y)+1
    except ValueError:   
        string = '1'
        for j in range(y+1):
            string += '0'
        print string
    else:
        print min1to9(z,y)
